job_tasks.phrase: de kansen en mogelijkheden van Generative AI uit te gaan nutten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to leveraging the capabilities of Generative AI, which involves modeling techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: hoe een probleem uit het bedrijf opgelost kan worden met de nieuwste taalmodellen
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the core task of applying language models to solve business problems, a direct application of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: technisch uitwerken van een nieuwe feature voor StedinGPT, onze interne versie van ChatGPT
job_tasks.justification: Developing a feature for an internal ChatGPT implies working with and extending large language models, a core modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: LLM technologie is nog nieuw maar jij doorziet goed voor welk probleem welke oplossing geschikt is
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the understanding and application of LLM technology to specific problems, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: nieuwe ideeën uit te laten proberen in een kleinschalige PoC
job_tasks.justification: Proof of Concepts (PoCs) are often used to test and validate new modeling approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: het naar productie brengen van Generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This implies deploying models that utilize Generative AI, a key aspect of the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij kan hier aan bijdrage als nieuwe Lead Developer collega
job_tasks.justification: The role title 'Lead Developer' directly indicates software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: hierin vertel je huidige stand van zaken in de ontwikkeling van de laatste features
job_tasks.justification: Discussing the development of features is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: kan er direct nog meer waarde gecreëerd worden op een veilige en schaalbare manier
job_tasks.justification: Creating value in a secure and scalable way refers to the software development principles for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: hoe die terecht moet komen in het Stedin IT landschap
job_tasks.justification: Integrating solutions into an existing IT landscape is a software development and deployment task.

job_tasks.phrase: langdurig goed werkende software af te leveren in productie
job_tasks.justification: Delivering long-lasting, well-functioning software in production is a direct software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Dit team opereert als een DevOps team
job_tasks.justification: Operating as a DevOps team implies a focus on software development and operational practices.
This emphasizes the role of developers, reinforcing the software development aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: als het plan voor de aankomende features veilig
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring security for upcoming features touches upon operational considerations and safe deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: kunnen we dit in de toekomst beter standaardiseren?
job_tasks.justification: Standardization of future features relates to operationalizing and maintaining systems.

job_tasks.phrase: naar productie brengen van Generative AI binnen het IT landschap van Stedin
job_tasks.justification: Bringing Generative AI into production within an IT landscape involves operational considerations.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and development of Generative AI, specifically mentioning 'Generative AI', 'language models', and 'StedinGPT' (internal ChatGPT). It details core GenAI Engineer responsibilities like solving business problems with LLMs and building features for an internal LLM application, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
